data.text: @CalvinKlein @khloekardashian @KylieJenner @KendallJenner @CalvinKlein , you are forever banned in my household.  You pay spokespeople who have absolutely no regard for the dignity of a special needs person.  Calling people retarded? You have stooped to an all new low in human relations

@CalvinKlein @khloekardashian @KylieJenner @KendallJenner @CalvinKlein , how low will you go? spokespeople for your brand publicly calling others retarded? I used to love you as a brand, always bought Calvin Klein for my husband, and have over 30 CK dresses, but never again. I'm emptying my closet of all CK forever!
